After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Measure of how accurately service appointments are scheduled compared to the requested dates and times, reflecting the effectiveness of the scheduling process.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: (Number of Accurately Scheduled Appointments / Total Number of Scheduled Appointments) * 100

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Average time between the service appointment request and the actual service appointment, indicating how quickly appointments are scheduled.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: Average Time from Service Request to Scheduled Appointment

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Percentage of scheduled service appointments where customers do not show up, reflecting the effectiveness of the scheduling and reminder processes.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: (Number of No-Show Appointments / Total Number of Scheduled Appointments) * 100

After Sales+Service Management.KPIS: Customer satisfaction with service scheduling process.
After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the scheduling process, including ease of making an appointment and communication, collected through post-scheduling surveys.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding Service Scheduling Process

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred for scheduling each service appointment, including administrative and operational expenses.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: Total Cost of Service Scheduling / Total Number of Scheduled Appointments

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Measure of the effectiveness and efficiency of the service scheduling process, based on metrics such as scheduling accuracy, lead time, and no-show rates.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: Average Efficiency Score of the Service Scheduling Process

After Sales+Service Management.KPIS: Service scheduling adherence to service level agreements.
After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Degree to which the service scheduling process meets the agreed-upon service levels and commitments, measured through performance assessments and audits.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: (Number of Scheduled Appointments Adhering to SLAs / Total Number of Scheduled Appointments) * 100

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Rate at which improvements are made to the service scheduling process, measured by tracking changes in efficiency, accuracy, and customer satisfaction over time.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: (Number of Scheduling Improvements Implemented / Total Number of Scheduling Activities) * 100

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Percentage of service progress tracked accurately against the actual service status, reflecting the reliability of the service tracking system.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: (Number of Accurately Tracked Services / Total Number of Services) * 100

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Measure of how well customers can view the progress of their service appointments, including updates on service status and completion estimates.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: (Number of Services with Visible Progress / Total Number of Services) * 100

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to respond to customer inquiries or requests for updates on service progress, reflecting the responsiveness of the service tracking system.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: Average Time to Respond to Service Tracking Requests

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the information and updates provided about service progress, collected through post-service surveys.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding Service Tracking

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred to track service progress for each customer, including system maintenance and administrative expenses.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: Total Cost of Service Tracking / Total Number of Customers

After Sales+Service Management.KPIS: Service tracking compliance with service level agreements.
After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Degree to which service tracking processes meet the agreed-upon service levels and commitments, measured through audits and performance evaluations.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: (Number of Services Tracked Complying with SLAs / Total Number of Tracked Services) * 100

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Rate at which improvements are made to the efficiency of the service tracking process, measured by changes in response times, accuracy, and customer satisfaction.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: (Number of Efficiency Improvements in Service Tracking / Total Number of Service Tracking Activities) * 100

After Sales+Service Management.KPIS: ROI (Return on Investment) from service tracking enhancements.
After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from improvements made to the service tracking process compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: (Net Benefits from Service Tracking Enhancements / Total Cost of Service Tracking Enhancements) * 100

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Percentage of available workshop capacity that is used for servicing vehicles, indicating how effectively workshop resources are utilized.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: (Total Hours of Workshop Usage / Total Available Workshop Hours) * 100

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Measure of how well the workshop’s available capacity is used, reflecting efforts to balance workload and maximize service throughput.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: (Optimal Workshop Capacity Utilized / Total Workshop Capacity) * 100

After Sales+Service Management.KPIS: Workshop throughput rate (vehicles serviced per day).
After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Average number of vehicles serviced per day in the workshop, indicating the productivity and efficiency of workshop operations.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: Total Number of Vehicles Serviced / Total Number of Operating Days

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Rate at which workshop downtime is reduced, reflecting efforts to minimize periods when the workshop is not in use for vehicle servicing.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: (Previous Downtime - Current Downtime) / Previous Downtime * 100

After Sales+Service Management.KPIS: Workshop maintenance cost per vehicle serviced.
After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred for maintaining the workshop per vehicle serviced, including labor, parts, and overhead expenses.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: Total Maintenance Cost / Total Number of Vehicles Serviced

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Measure of the overall efficiency of workshop operations, based on factors like throughput, capacity utilization, and maintenance costs.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: Average Efficiency Score of the Workshop Operations

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the workshop’s physical environment, including cleanliness, comfort, and accessibility, typically gathered through surveys.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding Workshop Facilities

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Percentage of safety standards and regulations met by the workshop, measured through safety audits and compliance checks.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: (Number of Safety Compliant Instances / Total Number of Safety Checks) * 100

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Percentage of technicians who complete required training programs, reflecting the effectiveness of training initiatives.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: (Number of Technicians Completing Training / Total Number of Technicians) * 100

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Measure of the improvement in technicians’ skills and knowledge following training programs, assessed through performance evaluations and testing.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: (Post-Training Skill Level - Pre-Training Skill Level) / Pre-Training Skill Level * 100

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Percentage of technicians who achieve certifications after completing required training programs, reflecting the effectiveness of training efforts.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: (Number of Technicians Attaining Certification / Total Number of Technicians) * 100

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from technician training programs compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of training benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: (Net Benefits from Training / Total Cost of Training) * 100

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the skills, knowledge, and professionalism of technicians, typically obtained through post-service surveys.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding Technician Expertise

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Percentage of technicians leaving the company within a specified period, indicating workforce stability and satisfaction.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: (Number of Technicians Leaving / Total Number of Technicians) * 100

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred for each hour of technician training, including instructor fees, materials, and administrative expenses.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: Total Cost of Training / Total Training Hours

After Sales+Service Management.EXPLANATION: Degree to which technician training programs adhere to established standards and requirements, measured through audits and evaluations.
After Sales+Service Management.FORMULA: (Number of Training Compliant Instances / Total Number of Training Instances) * 100
